Articles.Content:
Javascript is disabled. View full album

Stock Solar System plus additional planets of my own invention

Credit to NovaSilisko for the Voonian moons he posted in the Planet Ideas thread!

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Real planets

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Requests

Edited December 22, 2014 by Felsmak
Pretty sweet, I wish I could draw

Thanks!

It just takes some practice. I don't really consider myself that good yet, but I do like planets and have created lots of them throughout the years. So I have at least improved quite a bit since the first one I made back in 2009.
Wow, Felsmak! This is beautiful!
Thank you! I've started working on the Jool system now, by the way!
Good luck!

First of all, great work Felsmark.

Just two questions though: are the planets all scaled correctly towards each other? Aaaaand, can we get bigger pictures? I am thinking desktop background here
Those. Look. AWESOME!!! Though, sorry to criticize, but I don't like the way you did Duna, it seems there's a dark brown alien virus poisoning it's surface. Though maybe it's cooler that way

Thanks!

Just two questions though: are the planets all scaled correctly towards each other? Aaaaand, can we get bigger pictures? I am thinking desktop background here

I think so. I drew them over a bunch of spheres I created in 3ds Max according to the measurements on the Wiki. I probably won't draw any bigger pictures, though. At least not in a while. These, especially the small moons, were all created for this scale, so scaling them up would not be good.

Though, sorry to criticize, but I don't like the way you did Duna, it seems there's a dark brown alien virus poisoning it's surface. Though maybe it's cooler that way

I was going for a higher contrast with that one, kinda like the real Mars. But yeah, I should probably redo it. It was actually the first one I drew, so I wasn't really quite sure what I was doing then.

The maria on the Mun could probably use some rougher edges, too.

Edited August 1, 2014 by Felsmak
So, now I've done the moons of Jool! Now I just need Jool itself.

Duna's made of lava and Vall's melting. Epic.

Seriously though, these are really good. Keep it up!
Very nice work!
That's incredible!

DAT Eve

:OOOOOO

Thanks, everyone! Still struggling a bit with Jool, though. Might try to make up some new moons for the other, imaginary planets in the meantime.

Duna's made of lava and Vall's melting. Epic.

Heh, I was going for a more Europa-ish look for Vall. The idea is basically that new, brighter ice has leaked out through the cracks in the old, darker ice. Or something.

Edited August 1, 2014 by Felsmak
There! I've finally added Jool as well. I'm still not sure if I'm completely happy with it, but now the Solar System is complete!
Poor Eeloo...

Don't forget Dres! Never forget Dres!

(and Eeloo, too.)

I really like your takes on some of these planets, they weren't quite what I was expecting, but very neat.

Heh, this is the second time someone neglects Dres today. Poor Dres gets no love.

But yeah, neither Dres nor Eeloo are, ehum, real planets. I might include Dres when I've made up some dwarf planet friends for it, but Eeloo will be included as a moon of the second gas giant when I care to draw that one.

Speaking of gas giants and making things up. Here is Naal, the outermost of the Kerbal gas planets! As I imagine, of course. Equally imaginary moons will arrive shortly!

Edited August 2, 2014 by Felsmak
Pretty planet.

And now Naal has some moons as well! Much needed. I had to give it its own picture, though. Looks kinda stupid to include it in the solar system when nothing is between it and Jool.

Anyways, Naal is basically supposed to be the Neptune analog for the Kerbal solar system. It has three moons: Cobb, a dark and blockish asteroid; Kyle, an icy world that orbits Naal in the wrong direction; and Loopy, a small lump of ice with a ridiculously eccentric orbit - kinda like Nereid.

Kyle is probably way too similar to Triton, yes. But I really like Triton.

Do. Want. Naal.

Also, I did get the impression that you'd intended for Vall to like more like Europa. Looks good

Someone should make a mod that adds Naal and its moons.

I have yet to see a planet pack I'd be willing to add to my game, but I would install Naal in an instant!

Wow, that's quite a compliment! Thank you!

Anyway, here's another preview. This time I'm making the mysterious GP2! I was originally going for a somewhat blueish colour scheme, but then I played around a bit with the hue sliders and discovered this one instead. I kinda like the warmer colours better, actually. It sort of makes sense that the planet is warmer, too. Given that it's so freakin' massive and all.

WOAH!

That's preeetty! How do you make those?
